package LoginPage;
import org.openqa.selenium.By; 
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver; 
import org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxDriver; 
public class WebPage {
public static void main(String[] args) {
// TODO Auto-generated method stub
System.setProperty("webdriver.gecko.driver", "C:\\Users\\visha\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\Drivers\\geckodriver.exe"); 
WebDriver driver=new FirefoxDriver(); 
driver.get("https://github.com/login");
driver.findElement(By.id("login_field")).sendKeys("vish@gmail.com"); 
driver.findElement(By.id("password")).sendKeys("Computer"); 
driver.findElement(By.name("commit")).click();
String u=driver.getCurrentUrl();
if(u.equals("https://github.com/login"))
System.out.println("Test Pass");
else
System.out.println("Test Failed");
}
}
